resources.string: Teachers who love teaching, teach children to love learning!

Affordable quality STEM tuition for grades 6-12.
 We offer on-site math and science tutoring for curious young minds.
 Our instructors are all STEM-certified educators from the local top-tier universities.
 All new students get 50% off the first two months of tuition.
 Thereafter, the rate is $20/hour for all subjects.
 Please see below for the contact details.
1234 ABC Building, Mission Blvd, Fremont CA 95439
Hours of Operation: Mon-Fri: 3 p.m. - 6 p.m.\n Sat-Sun: 9 a.m - 4 p.m.
